Element.description: a connector that connects to a note shape for attaching additional description of the connected model element
defines a way to generate number sequence
a set of procedures that are executed automatically when certain events happen
a stored query accessible as a virtual table in a relational database
exists between two related entities where one is a specialized form of the other
where one or more records in the source entity can be related to any number of records in another
where many records in the source entity can be related to exactly one record in the relating entity
a text area to put in remarks
where a record in the source entity (table) can be related to many records in the relating entity
where a record in the source entity (table) is related to exactly one record in the relating entity
a set of procedures that are readily available for applications to access the database
stores the result returned by a stored procedure
